Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'astronomy' targeting readability level Upper Elementary. Limit the output to 200 words. Astronomy is the scientific study of celestial objects and phenomena that originate outside the Earth's atmosphere. This includes objects like stars, galaxies, and planets, as well as events like eclipses and meteor showers. Astronomy is an ancient field, with some of the earliest records of astronomical observations dating back thousands of years. Today, astronomers use advanced technology such as telescopes and satellites to make new discoveries about the universe. They also study the physical and chemical properties of celestial objects, their origins and evolution, and their interactions with each other. Astronomy can be both a fascinating hobby and a serious career choice, offering many opportunities to learn about the mysteries of the cosmos.
